body:
You must be the new student.
Working from home eh?
Well, don't be mistaken, it's still not going to be easy.
This is still med school after all.

Alright, we'll take things slow.
Hah!
Here's your first patient. Good luck!

title: 1 Miss
body:
Almost!
Try really hitting your spacebar HARD, and listen to that mighty clack. It helps your timing!

title: 1 Perfect
body:
Oh, look at you.
You clearly know how to do this already.
Congratulations.
That's it. One more time, without cues.

Alright. You've got the hang of it.
Your first patient is waiting outside.
He's got quite the heart rate..
(You can skip these tutorials next time by pressing N, by the way.)
Well, good luck.

title: 1 No Input
body:
Oh dear.
Remember to hit the spacebar on the SEVENTH BEAT.

title: 0 No Input
body:
Oh, hit the spacebar to advance the text.
There we go.
You really should know that kind of thing already.

title: EveryBeat
body: [HAFIZ PLS CHANGE THIS] Just hit the beat on the SEVENTH BEAT.
